mapper.select: SELECT id, weight, height, mbti, hobby, photo, military, religion, wealth, marriage, disease, user_id as userId FROM profile WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile (id, weight, height, mbti, hobby, photo, military, religion, wealth, marriage, disease, user_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{weight}, #{height}, #{mbti}, #{hobby}, #{photo}, #{military}, #{religion}, #{wealth}, #{marriage}, #{disease}, #{userId})
